content: the lexi curtain tie back @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes supplies 5 5mm hook worsted weight yarn single_crochet- single_crochet darning needle double_crochet- double_crochet scissors instructions 1 chain 12 join to first chain 2 chain 1 single_crochet 22 in ring just made with chain 22 @mimiandminimakes 3 chain 60 6 double_crochet in third chain from hook skip next 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next chain skip next 2 chains 6 double_crochet in next chain repeat all the way down 60 double_crochet 10sc 4 single_crochet 22 around the circle 22 5 going down the other side of the chain 60 make sure to put 1 single_crochet in the last single_crochet in the same space right after the ring repat the 6 double_crochet and single_crochet down going into the same chain spaces from opposite side join 60 double_crochet 10 single_crochet 6 chain 1 slip_stitch loosely all the way around join finish of and sew in ends this pattern is for your personal use only do not share sell copy this pattern you may sell any finished items made using this pattern but please mention or share the link to this pattern from mimiandminimakes thank you for purchasing my pattern @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes @mimiandminimakes
